title: Can't launch league, help!
body:
I believe i'm not the only one having this glitch as there was a couple reports on it earlier on here, i can't get league to work.
Sometimes i launch it and it just launches normal and then it won't let me get into a lobby to start a game and starts acting all weird.
Other times i launch it and all i see is the "League Of legends" thingy that's shown before the client launches and then nothing else happens over and over.
But then this one time i launched it and it showed a white screen reading this: 
Failed to load URL "https://riot:LCtIH450_BpQjh1dyzak7w@127.0.0.1:50022/index.html" with error "unknown error code -21" (-21).
How do i solve this?

replies.body: Those types of issues can pop up when your network can't get a solid connection with our servers for one reason or another. Sometimes it can be caused by packet loss, but other times we just need to adjust a few settings here and there. Check out this guide and go over you [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) just in case the main issue is there, and hit me back up if nothing seems to help!

This same thing happened to me and I fixed it, how I did this was I reinstalled league then I opened the RIOT GAMES folder and deleting league, there should be a file called something like lol.admin when you find it right click it and press run as administrator

Hello Friendly,

Try running the hextech repair tool located here --> https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs . If that doesn't work you may want to try emailing support with the logs it gives you and see if they can help you (here is support --> https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new ). I hope this helps!
I just noticed the error message had an URL, if i click it it shows a warning that the link might not be safe and if i proceed anyway it just shows that the page doesn't exist with error 404.
